Description:
To be successful you will need to meet the following:Open for candidates willing to relocate to the UAE. Preferably candidate already based in the UAE.
English law qualified or qualified in a common law jurisdiction including UK & USA.
Strong contract experience which includes drafting all types of contracts (i.e., Employment, Supply, Distribution, consultation, and joint ventures)
2 years post qualification experience.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.Job Details
